message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to get a better price.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to get a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to offer $11,000.  I think this is a fair price, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $11,250. I think this is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, but I'm still willing to negotiate.

Alice, I appreciate your continued negotiation.  I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $11,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this point.

I understand you're sticking to your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to accept $11,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11,200. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I hope we can reach an agreement at this point.
